017package org.apache.juneau.internal;
018
019import java.util.*;
020
021import org.apache.juneau.*;
022import org.apache.juneau.common.utils.*;
023
024/**
025 * Wrapper around a map where the key names are overridden.
026 *
027 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
028
029 * </ul>
030 *
031 * @param <K> The key class type.
032 * @param <V> The value class type.
033 */
034public class FilteredMap<K,V> extends AbstractMap<K,V> implements Delegate<Map<K,V>> {
035
036   final Map<K,V> innerMap;
037   final Set<Map.Entry<K,V>> entries;
038   final ClassMeta<Map<K,V>> classMeta;
039
040   /**
041    * Constructor.
042    *
043    * @param classMeta The class type of the map being wrapped.
044    * @param innerMap The map being wrapped.  Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
045    * @param keys The keys in the new map.  Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
046    */
047   public FilteredMap(ClassMeta<Map<K,V>> classMeta, Map<K,V> innerMap, K[] keys) {
048      Utils.assertArgNotNull("innerMap", innerMap);
049      Utils.assertArgNotNull("keys", keys);
050
051      this.classMeta = classMeta;
052      this.innerMap = innerMap;
053         List<Map.Entry<K,V>> l = new ArrayList<>(keys.length);
054         for (K k : keys)
055            if (innerMap.containsKey(k))
056               l.add(createEntry(k));
057         entries = new ListSet<>(l);
058      }
059
060   private Map.Entry<K,V> createEntry(final K key) {
061      return new Map.Entry<>() {
062
063         @Override /* Map.Entry */
064         public K getKey() {
065            return key;
066         }
067
068         @Override /* Map.Entry */
069         public V getValue() {
070            return innerMap.get(key);
071         }
072
073         @Override /* Map.Entry */
074         public V setValue(V v) {
075            return innerMap.put(key, v);
076         }
077      };
078   }
079
080   @Override /* Map */
081   public Set<Map.Entry<K,V>> entrySet() {
082      return entries;
083   }
084
085   /**
086    * A set with ordered entries (a List with a Set API).
087    */
088   private static class ListSet<E> extends AbstractSet<E> {
089
090      private List<E> entries;
091
092      public ListSet(List<E> entries) {
093         this.entries = entries;
094      }
095
096      @Override /* Set */
097      public Iterator<E> iterator() {
098         return entries.iterator();
099      }
100
101      @Override /* Set */
102      public int size() {
103         return entries.size();
104      }
105   }
106
107   @Override /* Delegate */
108   public ClassMeta<Map<K,V>> getClassMeta() {
109      return classMeta;
110   }
111}
